str2: Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To plow. From arotron; to plow.
To plow. From arotron; to plow.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To thresh (wheat). From the same as halon; to tread out grain.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Or, its prolonged form opheileo probably from the base of ophelos; to owe; figuratively, to be under obligation; morally, to fail in duty.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
From meta and echo; to share or participate; by implication, belong to, eat.
